snippet: Most of Gov. Andrew M. Cuomo’s impressive haul has come from deep-pocketed donors, including many real estate developers and Wall Street figures.
abstract: New York Gov Andrew M Cuomo has been raising money at pace of $1 million per month in 2013, impressive haul that fortifies his standing as he looks toward re-election bid in 2014; Cuomo reports balance of $27.8 million in his campaign account, up from $22.5 million in January.
lead_paragraph: Most of Gov. Andrew M. Cuomo’s impressive haul has come from deep-pocketed donors, including many real estate developers and Wall Street figures.

headline.print_headline: Fund-Raising for Cuomo Is Going Strong, Though Next Race Is Year Away
